channel.title: April Raintree
channel.description:
i have to write a essay about April Raintree written by Beatrice Culleton. Here is the exact question:
write an essay giving 3 reasons to the Childerns Aid Society as why Carmen should or should not be taken from her present family. reminders: you must be able to make inferences based on the information that has been presented to you on Carmen's situation.
here is a link to 2 pictures you have to also give some info about this 2 page story. http://img50.imageshack.us/my.php?image=ccf0062200700000al1.jpg http://img372.imageshack.us/my.php?image=ccf0062200700001cr3.jpg
If you can do this for me i need it in 2days if you can finish it in 2days ill give u rs money thx

item.title: April Raintree
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

The main purpose of this section is to help you with your assignment, not do it for you.

Reason 1: The new parents are caring.
Reason 2: New family can support Carmen.
Reason 3: You find it. (I can’t help you with everyting)

Now, just write a 6-7 sentence paragraph per reason.

Read full topic
